Articles.Content:
Are there any mods out there that contain a variety of stock-alike engines and tanks that are "tiny" diameter, like the Oscar-B tank?

I'm thinking of things like an engine with a thrust that sits between the LV-1/LV-1R (ant) at 1.5 kN, and the 24-77/48-7S. And fuel tanks with the same diameter but longer length than the Oscar-B.

I suggest RLA Stockalike, it recently had a variety of 0.625 metre fuel tanks and engines added to it.

Link: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24593-WIP-RLA-Roemy-Lemdun-Atomics-Stockalike-0-7-1-released
RLA stockalike get's another vote of confidence from me. It's one of a handful of stockalike mods that made the cut to be an official mod for Kethotech Industries.

Here's another you might want to look inot... haven't used it myself.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/0-18-2-sceppies-0-5m-minipack/
Cool, I'll check those both out. Thanks
there are a lot of small parts in AIES, but AIES also has a lot of large parts.

there are a lot of small parts in AIES, but AIES also has a lot of large parts.

Just delete the folders for all but the parts you actually want.

Not sure if these are what you want, but here's a couple small engine mods:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/some-medium-and-small-sized-engines/

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/small-sized-engines-and-rcs-thrusters/
